General.Name: WebCash Corporation
General.Description: WebCash Corporation provides B2B fintech platform solutions for business. It also engages in the corporate CMS and other business. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: 220 KN Digital Tower, Seoul, South Korea
